name: Dawn of the Nasty
overview: Dawn of the Nasty is a vertically scrolling shooter game with decent music made by Simon J. Reece in 1994 using Chris Yates' SEUCK in 1994. This game has or or two player co-op, you can play with either joystick for one player by pressing the button to play either the characters of Harold or Darren Booth, or play with a second player.
